content: Governments won’t use Bitcoin. Only the people will be surveilled. This fixes nothing.
They done it recently to UK farners via inheritance tax. Forces you to sell the farmland to pay the taxes

Crypto is moving from its "wild west/open frontier" phase toward more structured, regulated integration much like the internet went from an unregulated academic tool to heavily monitored commercialized global infrastructure. 

Institutions want the privacy features.

they have some information about their supply and audit on the website, you can send the token to any EVM wallet 

uranium.io/en
Exactly. Build it & they’ll regulate-NGMI if you ask me. ️
